{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$87.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with CASCADE AEROSPACE.

Across 5 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 4 have at least one amendment (80%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 59% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$625.8M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 10.31 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$303.3M. The longest contract was 19.02 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.0B.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [CASCADE AEROSPACE INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22CASCADE%20AEROSPACE%20INC%22)
{{< /details >}}
